title: MP Ganesan condemns MP Wedaarachchi’s son over obscenities against police
body_lines: Mano Ganesan condemns MP Wedaarachchi’s son, daughter-in-law over using obscenities against police.  Tamil People’s Alliance (TPA) leader Mano Ganesan said he condemned the disgraceful words used and behaviour in the altercation involving opposition MP MP Dilip Wedaarachchi’s son and daughter-in-law with police officers. I request MP Wedaarachchi to provide necessary guidelines to his Son & Daughter-in-law to cooperate with the police,” he said in a Twitter message.
